subject: question on ServletTestRunner
msgSnippet: Hi All, I m also experiencing the error of ServletTestRunner is currently unavailable in running the sample program
messageBody:
Hi All,

I'm also experiencing the error of ServletTestRunner is currently
unavailable in running the sample program
http://localhost:8080/test/ServletTestRunner?suite=TestSampleServlet

I already did what's in the email thread. Like the cactus.jar must
be in \jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24\webapps\test\WEB-INF\lib. I already put
the cactus.properties in the classpath.

Versions:
jakarta-cactus-13-1.3
jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24

Please advise.
